name: Broughtons/Johnstone Strait Waterproof Map
description: The north entrance to Johnstone Strait at Telegraph Cove is one of the most popular kayaking destinations in British Columbia, mainly due to the migration of killer whales. This map will help you plan your trip and get your bearings. Printed on indestructible waterproof polymer paper, this Broughtons/Johnstone Strait map includes campsites, launch locations and scenic features.
